svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 6, 2024" date: "2024-04-05"
Eth News and Links
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
* Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes . Notes
from Christine Kim : Missed slots : Lighthouse & Prysm updated to allow Beacon API
submission of blobs even if block observed on p2p Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting
late 2024) Electra included EIPs : Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation
tracker EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready EIP7002 execution layer
triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals EIP7251 maxEB :
community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated consolidations
(touches EIP7002) at cost of added complexity EIP7549 committee index outside
attestation : may update for better packing efficiency Electra candidates for
inclusion: EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues EIP7594 PeerDAS
: work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could alternatively
include EIP7659 to increase blob throughput
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes . Notes
from Christine Kim :
* Missed slots : Lighthouse & Prysm updated to allow Beacon API submission of blobs
even if block observed on p2p
Missed slots : Lighthouse & Prysm updated to allow Beacon API submission of blobs even
if block observed on p2p
* Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) Electra included EIPs :
Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker EIP6110 validator deposits
onchain : mostly ready EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to
handle partial withdrawals EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom
ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added complexity
EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for better packing efficiency
Electra candidates for inclusion: EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility
issues EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term
could alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob throughput
Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
* Electra included EIPs : Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready EIP7002 execution layer triggerable
exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals EIP7251 maxEB : community input
wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at
cost of added complexity EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for
better packing efficiency
Electra included EIPs :
* Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker
Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker
* EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready
* EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial
withdrawals
EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial
* EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated
consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added complexity
EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated
* EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for better packing
efficiency
* Electra candidates for inclusion: EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074
compatibility issues
Electra candidates for inclusion:
* EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues
* EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could
alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob throughput
EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could
* EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance) Breakout call notes : custom
ceilings, min activation balance constant, week subjectivity issues and concerns from
Lido
EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance)
* Breakout call notes : custom ceilings, min activation balance constant, week
subjectivity issues and concerns from Lido
* EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) Breakout call notes : potential solutions for validity
& availability issues
EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists)
* Breakout call notes : potential solutions for validity & availability issues
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* 🚨 Lido at 29.68% finally drops below 30%, still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 29.68% finally drops below 30%, still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 63% majority
Stakefish migrated to 50% Nethermind Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over
33.3% could mean loss of finality Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with
discouragement attack
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth 63% majority Stakefish migrated to 50% Nethermind
Execution layer: Geth 63% majority
* Stakefish migrated to 50% Nethermind
* Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with discouragement attack
Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with discouragement attack
* Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America &
Layer 1
* Reward curve with tempered issuance : trade-offs, security considerations and
endgame
Client Releases
* Consensus layer: Prysm v5.0.3 : patch with enhancements & bug fixes
Consensus layer:
* Prysm v5.0.3 : patch with enhancements & bug fixes
* Execution layer: Reth v0.2.0-beta.5 : fixes Merkle pipeline stage out of memory
issue, adds pruner timeout and supports running on NFS volumes
Execution layer:
* Reth v0.2.0-beta.5 : fixes Merkle pipeline stage out of memory issue, adds pruner
timeout and supports running on NFS volumes
Layer 2
* Base gas target increased to 5 mgas/s
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs: EIP7666 : EVM-ify the identity precompile EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash
functions EIP7668 : Remove bloom filters EIP7669 : Linear EVM memory limits EIP7670 :
Reduced attestation format EIP7675 : Retroactively included EIPs EIP7676 : EOF -
Prepare for address space extension
EIPs:
* EIP7666 : EVM-ify the identity precompile
EIP7666 : EVM-ify the identity precompile
* EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash functions
EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash functions
* EIP7668 : Remove bloom filters
EIP7668 : Remove bloom filters
* EIP7669 : Linear EVM memory limits
EIP7669 : Linear EVM memory limits
* EIP7670 : Reduced attestation format
EIP7670 : Reduced attestation format
* EIP7675 : Retroactively included EIPs
EIP7675 : Retroactively included EIPs
* EIP7676 : EOF - Prepare for address space extension
EIP7676 : EOF - Prepare for address space extension
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7672 : Event-driven NFT utilities ERC7673 :
Distinguishable base256emoji addresses ERC7674 : Temporary approval extension for
ERC20 ERC7677 : Paymaster web service capability ERC7679 : UserOperation builder
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7672 : Event-driven NFT utilities
ERC7672 : Event-driven NFT utilities
* ERC7673 : Distinguishable base256emoji addresses
ERC7673 : Distinguishable base256emoji addresses
* ERC7674 : Temporary approval extension for ERC20
ERC7674 : Temporary approval extension for ERC20
* ERC7677 : Paymaster web service capability
ERC7677 : Paymaster web service capability
* ERC7679 : UserOperation builder
ERC7679 : UserOperation builder
Stuff for developers
* Solidity Developer Survey 2023 results : Hardhat usage at 33%, Foundry 32% & Remix
26% Solidity v0.8 usage at 82%
Solidity Developer Survey 2023 results :
* Hardhat usage at 33%, Foundry 32% & Remix 26%
Hardhat usage at 33%, Foundry 32% & Remix 26%
* Solidity v0.8 usage at 82%
Solidity v0.8 usage at 82%
* Guide to migrate from from hardhat-deploy to Hardhat Ignition
Guide to migrate from from hardhat-deploy to Hardhat Ignition
* Tweak (Foundry fork): alter onchain verified contracts (e.g. add console.log) &
replay historical transactions
Tweak (Foundry fork): alter onchain verified contracts (e.g. add console.log) & replay
historical transactions
* Hayden asked should Uniswap v4 remove events & move to call traces for 1% gas saving
on swaps Lefteris: need agreement & standardization for any alternative
Hayden asked should Uniswap v4 remove events & move to call traces for 1% gas saving
on swaps
* Lefteris: need agreement & standardization for any alternative
* Coinbase Solidity style guide
Coinbase Solidity style guide
* OpenSea ERC721C support : enforced creator royalties but restricted to OpenSea &
Magic Eden
OpenSea ERC721C support : enforced creator royalties but restricted to OpenSea & Magic
Eden
* Fuzz-utils v0.2.0 : generate Echidna/Medusa compatible fuzzing harnesses
Fuzz-utils v0.2.0 : generate Echidna/Medusa compatible fuzzing harnesses
* Sigmund (CLI): collect function selectors from any contract
Sigmund (CLI): collect function selectors from any contract
* Swiss knife determine contract address using deployer address & nonce
Swiss knife determine contract address using deployer address & nonce
* SIWE AAbstractor : connect smart accounts to apps via Sign in with Ethereum
SIWE AAbstractor : connect smart accounts to apps via Sign in with Ethereum
* Viem experimental : support for draft EIP5792 (batch transactions with paymaster
capability)
Viem experimental : support for draft EIP5792 (batch transactions with paymaster
* Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): minimal implementations of ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): minimal implementations of ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
* Open Labels Initiative : framework & data model for EVM address labeling
Open Labels Initiative : framework & data model for EVM address labeling
* CTFs: Secureum RACE #28 : 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
CTFs:
* Secureum RACE #28 : 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Security
* Geth DoS vulnerability disclosed , nodes with exposed RPC could be crashed by
applying EIPs out of order during an eth_call, fixed in v1.13.13
Ecosystem
* Vitalik: next steps in the Purge , precompiles, history (via EIP4444), log reform &
moving to SSZ
Vitalik: next steps in the Purge , precompiles, history (via EIP4444), log reform &
* Road to Devcon event calendar
Road to Devcon event calendar
* Hackathon winners: ETHBucharest & ETHSeoul
Hackathon winners: ETHBucharest & ETHSeoul
Enterprise
* Project Agorá : BIS & 7 central banks explore tokenization of cross-border payments
Job Listings
* ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Senior Product Manager
ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Senior Product Manager
* Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
* Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
* Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
* Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
* 🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 8.6 to 120.5 gwei, with 25.8 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 22.7 gwei 2.8k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 8.6 to 120.5 gwei, with 25.8 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 22.7 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.7 gwei
* 2.8k ETH net burn this week
2.8k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $3,224 - $3,641, currently $3,325
ETHUSD : $3,224 - $3,641, currently $3,325
* ETHBTC : currently 0.049 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.049 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* Maker's big bet on Ethena Aave proposes 0% LTV for Dai in response
Maker's big bet on Ethena
* Aave proposes 0% LTV for Dai in response
* Blob inscriptions fizzle out
Blob inscriptions fizzle out
* Synthetix v3 live on Base, using USDC as collateral
Synthetix v3 live on Base, using USDC as collateral
* Gitcoin Grants 20 applications open until April 16; open source software rounds:
infrastructure, dev tooling, apps and hackathon alumni
Gitcoin Grants 20 applications open until April 16; open source software rounds:
Regulation/business/tokens
* US vs Roman Storm: amicus briefs from Blockchain Association , Coin Center & DeFi
Education Fund
US vs Roman Storm: amicus briefs from Blockchain Association , Coin Center & DeFi
* SEC Commissioner Peirce: improving communication between public & SEC
SEC Commissioner Peirce: improving communication between public & SEC
* Bank of England & FCA digital securities sandbox consultation, feedback by May 29
Bank of England & FCA digital securities sandbox consultation, feedback by May 29
General
* Vitalik: degen communism [posted April 1], chaos aligned with common good, e.g.
memecoin issuance to charity, public goods funding, fork out concentrated players,
land value taxes and Harberger taxes on IP
Vitalik: degen communism [posted April 1], chaos aligned with common good, e.g.
* XZ Utils (compression library) backdoored , v5.6.0/1 impacted, found after logins
via ssh 0.5s slower
XZ Utils (compression library) backdoored , v5.6.0/1 impacted, found after logins via
ssh 0.5s slower
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-april-6-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Apr 12-14 – ETHDam (Amsterdam) conference & hackathon
Apr 12-14 – ETHDam (Amsterdam) conference & hackathon
* Apr 16-18 – EY Global blockchain summit (London)
Apr 16-18 – EY Global blockchain summit (London)
* Apr 19-21 – ETH Tallinn hackathon
Apr 19-21 – ETH Tallinn hackathon
* Apr 20-21 – ETHDubai conference & hackathon
Apr 20-21 – ETHDubai conference & hackathon
* Apr 23-May 7 – Gitcoin Grants 20 (application deadline Apr 16)
Apr 23-May 7 – Gitcoin Grants 20 (application deadline Apr 16)
* Apr 26-28 – ETHBoston hackathon & conference
Apr 26-28 – ETHBoston hackathon & conference
* May 3-5 – ETHGlobal Sydney hackathon
May 3-5 – ETHGlobal Sydney hackathon
* May 10-11 – ETH Bratislava conference & hackathon
May 10-11 – ETH Bratislava conference & hackathon
* May 21-23 – DappCon (Berlin)
May 21-23 – DappCon (Berlin)
* May 24-26 – ETHBerlin hackathon
May 24-26 – ETHBerlin hackathon
* May 31-Jun 2 – ETHDublin hackathon & conference
May 31-Jun 2 – ETHDublin hackathon & conference
* May 31-Jun 2 – ETHPrague conference & hackathon
May 31-Jun 2 – ETHPrague conference & hackathon
* May 31-Jun 5 – ETH Belgrade hackathon & conference
May 31-Jun 5 – ETH Belgrade hackathon & conference
* Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
* Jun 21-23 – ETHKyiv hackathon & conference
Jun 21-23 – ETHKyiv hackathon & conference
* Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
Jul 8-11 – EthCC (Brussels) conference
* Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
Jul 12-14 – ETHGlobal Brussels hackathon
* Jul 26-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
Jul 26-30 – EDCON Tokyo conference
* Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
Aug 23-Sep 13 – ETHGlobal ETHOnline virtual hackathon
* Aug 23-26 – ETHTokyo hackathon & conference
Aug 23-26 – ETHTokyo hackathon & conference
* Aug 29-31 – ETHAccra hackathon
Aug 29-31 – ETHAccra hackathon
* Sep 5-8 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
Sep 5-8 – ETHWarsaw conference & hackathon
* Sep 9-15 – ETHSafari (Kenya)
Sep 9-15 – ETHSafari (Kenya)
* Sep 12-14 – NapulETH (Napoli)
Sep 12-14 – NapulETH (Napoli)
* Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
Sep 20-22 – ETHGlobal Singapore hackathon
* Oct 4-6 – ETHRome
Oct 4-6 – ETHRome
* Oct 17-19 – ETHSofia conference & hackathon
Oct 17-19 – ETHSofia conference & hackathon
* Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
Oct 18-20 – ETHGlobal San Francisco hackathon
* Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 – Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
* Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 – ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
